name: Journey 1: The Beginning
description:
The Journey is a free browser game developed in JavaScript and HTML. This is the first level, in which the main character's goal is to break free from the cage he is in. He also must find a way to cross the abyss. 

By collecting coins (while avoiding viruses), he begins building a bridge to cross to the other side. But there is something he hasn't been told... a mystery which will be progressively revealed. If he survives.

The game continues in The Journey 2: Castle Quest. You can play here: https://josueac.itch.io/the-journey-2-castle-quest

If you want to save your score you can also play in https://aigames.epizy.com/ and make it in the leaderboard.
